19594.「今回の件…… 魔軍師イッドが 大風車塔の\n 儀式の間を汚したことで 眠ってい:
In this case, scholars speculate that Tactician Idd's defilement of the Great Windmill Tower's Ritual Hall may have brought
back to life a sleeping ghost.

19595.「……以前 解読したフォステイル伝は\n フォステイルを憎む パルカラス王が 怨:
...The Fostail Biography that I deciphered
before must have been twisted out of spite by
King Porcarras, who hates Fostail.

19596.「ラ…ラグアス王子！\n 一大事であります……！: Prince Raguas! This is a big deal.

19598.「チョ…チョッピ荒野の 北部にある\n チューザー地下空洞に\n 恐ろしい魔力を:
In the Choozah Hollow in the northern part of the Choppi Wilderness, a ghost with terrifying magical powers has
appeared...

19599.「我々…精鋭部隊が 数十人がかりで\n その亡霊と 戦いましたが……。\n あ…:
We, the elite troops, fought the ghost by the
dozens, but I've never seen anything like it!

19600.「手も足も 出ませんでした……。\n お…恐ろしい呪文の使い手です……。\n あ:
I couldn't do anything about the terrible
spell he wielded to release that monster. ...

19601.「その身体で よくぞ ここまで……。\n あなたのような兵士が いることを\n:
I am proud to have a soldier like you in my
life.

19602.「王子…から そのような言葉を……。\n うう……。私…は うれしい……。\n:
Such words from the prince... make me happy...
and I have no regrets. I have no regrets...

19603.「あなたのはたらきは ムダにはしません……。\n どうか やすらかに眠ってくださ:
Your work will not be in vain... please sleep
peacefully...

19604.「恐ろしい魔力を持つ亡霊……。\n いよいよ 悪夢が現実になるのか……。:
A ghost with terrifying magical powers... Will
this nightmare finally become a reality?

19605.「その亡霊は おそらく パルカラス王でしょう。\n まもなく 何千もの亡霊兵士を:
The ghost is probably Ghost King Palkaras.
Soon he will march on this castle with
thousands of Spirit Soldiers.

19606.「そうなれば 多くの犠牲者が出るでしょう。\n なんとしても その前に\n パル:
If that happens, there will be many
casualties. At all costs, we must defeat Ghost
King Palkaras before that happens.

19607.「パルカラス王は フォステイルが現れるまでは\n プクランド大陸一と呼ばれた 魔:
King Parkaras is a wizard who was called the best in Pukuland Continent before Fostail appeared. Though no ordinary man could ever
hope to defeat him...

19608.「かつて この大陸を救ってくれた\n <pc>さんなら 必ず 勝てるはずです。\:
I am sure that <pc>, who once saved
this continent, will be able to win. I believe
in your power.

19609.「ここより南東 チョッピ荒野の北部にある\n チューザー地下空洞で パルカラス亡:
Southeast of here, in the Choozah Hollow in the northern part of the Choppi Wilderness, would you be willing to defeat
Ghost King Palkaras and protect Royal City?

19610.「ありがとうございます！\n パルカラス亡霊王は かなりの強敵のはずです！\n:
Thank you! Ghost King Palkaras should be a
formidable opponent! Please make sure you're
fully prepared before you head out!

19611.「ありがとうございます！\n ……ですが どうやら 頼まれごとを\n たくさん:
Thank you! I'm sorry, but it seems you have a
lot of requests.

19612.「都を守るためには どうしても\n <pc>さんのチカラが 必要なんですが\n:
I really need the power of <pc> to
protect the capital, but this... this is a
problem...

19613.「ほかの用事が 終わったら\n また ここに戻ってきてください。\n お待ちして:
Come back here when you're done with your
other business. We'll be waiting for you
<pc>.

19614.「くっ……。そうですか……。\n 都を守るためには <pc>さんのチカラが\n:
Damn... well... we need the power of
<pc> to protect the city, but I'm
stumped...

19615.「このままでは 多くの犠牲者が……。\n いったい どうすれば……。:
If we don't do something, there will be many
more victims.

19616.「余は 眠りに ついていたのか……。\n この余を 眠りにつかせる者など\n 天:
I was asleep... There is only one person in
all the land who can put me to sleep.

19617.「フォステイル。余に 盾突いた男め。\n こざかしい古代呪文を 使いおって……。:
Fostail. The man who shields me. You use some
ancient spell and you think you can stop me
with one little thing?

19619.「フォステイル！ 貴様の天下など３日も持たぬ！\n フハハハハ！ まだまだ未熟よ:
Fostail! Your reign will not last three days!
Hahahahaha! I'm still a novice!

19620.「余が 号令をかければ 貴様は終わる！\n 不屈の闘志を持つ精鋭たちが 進軍を始:
When I give the command, you will be finished! Your kingdom will be reduced to ashes when the elite, with their indomitable fighting spirit,
begin their march!

19622.「また ゴミが入り込んできたようだ。\n 貴様も 逆賊フォステイルの命令により\:
It seems that trash has entered again. You, too, by order of the renegade Fostail, are going to send me down to the Hell in one
piece?

19623.「面白い！ では 余興を楽しむとしよう。\n 先ほどのゴミたちは 剣を振りまわし:
Interesting! Now let's enjoy the sideshow. The
trash from earlier were brandishing swords,
but I don't want to see any silly dancing.

19624.「よいか！？ 余を 楽しませるのだ！！\n 貴様の持つ すべてのチカラを見せてみ:
You see? Entertain me! Show me everything
you've got! Show me everything you've
got! Give it your all!

19625.「フハハハハハ！！ また 貴様か！！\n 愚か者め！！ せっかく助かった命を\n:
Hahahahahaha! You again! You fool! You've gone
to the trouble of scattering the lives you
saved!

19626.「まあ 退屈しのぎに ちょうどよいわ！！\n もう一度 相手をしてやろう！！:
Well, I guess I'll just have to kill the
boredom! Let's play him again!

19627.「ヌオオオオオオオ……。\n か…身体が もたぬのか……。:
Noooooooooo... I...don't know if my body can
handle it...

19628.「こ…これほどまでに 余を追いつめる者が\n 逆賊フォステイル以外に いたとは…:
Who else but the renegade pirate Fostail could
have hunted me down like this... but just for
this... ...

19629.「これしきのことで 余は止められぬぞ……。\n 余の辞書に 敗北の二文字はない…:
This will not stop me there is no defeat in my
dictionary I will not retreat. I will not run
away...

19630.「この程度の苦痛うううううぅぅぅーーー！！\n 逆賊フォステイルに 無理矢理に妻:
This level of pain uuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu uuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu! Compared to the suffering of my daughter, who was
forcibly taken as my wife by the renegade Fostail!

19632.「その装束……。王家の者か……。\n 貴様 何者だ？:
That outfit you're wearing, you're royalty...
who are you?

19633.「パルカラス王よ。\n 私は 現王のラグアスです。: King Parcharas. I am Raguas, the present king.

19634.「貴様が 王だと……？\n なにを 言っているのだ……？: You are the king? What are you talking about?

19635.「ご存知ないかもしれませんが\n あなたの生きた時代から\n すでに ５００年の:
You may not know it, but 500 years have
already passed since your time.

19637.「城に残った兵士の家族を 丁重に扱い\n あなたの娘である メギストリス姫にも\:
You will treat the families of the soldiers who remain in the castle with the utmost courtesy and lavish kindness on your
daughter, the Princess Megistris.

19638.「メギストリス姫は フォステイルの深い愛情に\n 心を打たれ ふたりは結ばれたの:
Princess Megistris was moved by Fostail's deep
affection, and the two were united in
marriage. Thus, Megistris became queen.

19639.「なにを バカなことを……。\n 余は…余は 信じぬぞ……。: What nonsense... I don't believe you...

19640.「フォステイル王は……\n メギストリス王妃が 国の母として\n 未来永劫に渡り:
King Fostail... has decreed that Queen
Megistris will be the Mother of the Nation and
beloved by her people for all time to come.

19641.「あなたの娘の名を 王国の名にしたのです。\n 今の王国の名は……:
I named your daughter after the kingdom. The
name of the kingdom now is...

19642.「メギストリス王国といいます。: It is called the Kingdom of Megistris.

19644.「メ…メギストリス王国だと……？\n 余の娘が 国民から愛されるよう\n あの逆:
The Kingdom of Megistris? Did the traitor go
to such lengths to ensure that my daughter
would be loved by the people?

19645.「オオオオオオオオオ……………。\n 魔術だけでなく 王としての器さえも\n 奴:
Not only was he better in magic, but he was
even better as a king...

19647.「怨念により 書き換えられた書には\n パルカラス王国への進軍と 書かれていまし:
The book, rewritten by a grudge, said to march
on the kingdom of Palkaras.

19648.「パルカラス王が 国名が変わったことを\n 知らなかったためでしょう。ぼくは そ:
King Parcharas did not know that the name of
the country had changed. I wanted to tell him
that.

19649.「王族も 民も 我が子を愛する心は\n 皆 同じか……。:
Royalty and people, they all love their
children the same.

19650.「その深い愛情を 国民にも注ぐことができれば\n きっと パルカラス王は\n 偉:
If he could have extended that same deep love
to his people, I'm sure King Palkaras would
have been a great king.

19651.「……ありがとうございます <cs_pchero>さん。\n あなたが いなけれ:
Thank you <cs_pchero>. I don't know what
Megistris would have done without you...

19652.「ぼくは 先に 城へ戻っていますので\n 後で メギストリスの都に来てください。:
I'm going back to the castle first, so you'll
have to come back to Megistris later.

45593.「あなたの怨念が 内容を変えてしまった\n あの本に パルカラス王国の名を見つけ:
I realized when I found the name of the
Kingdom of Parkalas in that book, which had
been altered by your grudge.

45594.「あの時代 この国の名が\n その名であるはずがなかった。\n つまり あなたは:
In those days, the name of this country could
not have been that name. So you know nothing
about...

45595.「余が……何も 知らぬ…だと？\n 何を 言っておる……。:
You think I don't know anything? What are you
saying...
